HomeInfoComponent.name: Alessandro
HomeInfoComponent.description: A Software Engineer specializing in building innovative web solutions
HomeInfoComponent.about: Throughout my career, I have developed skills that form the core of my approach to development.
HomeInfoComponent.projects: I've had the opportunity to work on exciting projects and grow professionally. Curious to learn more?
HomeInfoComponent.contact: Needed a project done or looking for a dev? I'm just a few keystrokes away

AboutComponent.name: Alessandro
AboutComponent.description: Software Engineer based in Italy, with a strong focus on Frontend Development and a passion for creating intuitive and high-performance user interfaces.
AboutComponent.workExperienceDescription: My professional experiences have allowed me to refine my technical skills and grow as a developer, collaborating with skilled teams and tackling challenging projects. Here's a summary of my most significant experiences:

ProjectsComponent.description: Throughout my career as a developer, I have created various projects that reflect my passion for programming and innovation. Each project represents a unique challenge that has allowed me to grow professionally and experiment with new technologies.

projectsDescription.Xora: A modern landing page showcasing Xora AI Video Editor, featuring its key features, pricing plans, and automated video editing capabilities powered by AI.
projectsDescription.GymExercises: A comprehensive fitness app that helps users discover exercises with detailed descriptions, target muscles, demonstration videos, and related workouts for a complete training experience.
projectsDescription.AdminDashboard: A feature-rich admin panel with authentication, analytics dashboard, company management system, and an integrated Kanban board for project management.
projectsDescription.ZentryAwwwards: Innovative React website with GSAP animations, crafted to deliver a groundbreaking gaming experience that's immersive, dynamic, and visually stunning.
projectsDescription.Apple: Mockup of the iPhone 15 Pro presentation site. Built with React, TailwindCSS, GSAP, and Three.js. Also integrated Sentry support for error and performance monitoring.

ContactComponent.title: Get in Touch
ContactComponent.name: Name
ContactComponent.messagePlaceholder: Let me know how i can help you!

orbyta.point1: Deepened knowledge of Angular, integrating concepts such as Redux, microfrontends, and npm package creation, while working on an application managing sensors and systems for major transportation companies in Italy.
orbyta.point2: Studied and applied new frameworks like Node.js, Express, and NestJS.
orbyta.point3: Gained experience with Docker and Kubernetes.

weplus.point1: Studied HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, applying these skills by creating a showcase website.
weplus.point2: Learned the basics of Angular and practiced by developing two custom applications: a recipe book and a builder for electric guitars, allowing users to choose components and guitar types.
weplus.point3: Gained experience in teamwork, using version control tools, and meeting deadlines.
